title: Replace Our Work Section Photos with New Uploaded Project Photos

requirements.text: Save all 14 newly uploaded project photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ using the following filenames: work-01.jpg (60417559408__EA07A836-4DBF-4202-B2B6-336CE9DC4F64.jpeg), work-02.jpg (IMG_2193.jpeg), work-03.jpg (IMG_7416.jpeg), work-04.jpg (IMG_7407.jpeg), work-05.jpg (IMG_3062.jpeg), work-06.jpg (60418777983__B4A1B7E7-D0BE-4D92-827F-4719EDF3DE81.jpeg), work-07.jpg (IMG_3573.jpeg), work-08.jpg (IMG_0619.jpeg), work-09.jpg (IMG_2833.jpeg), work-10.jpg (IMG_7766.jpeg), work-11.jpg (IMG_2569.jpeg), work-12.jpg (IMG_0039.jpeg), work-13.jpg (IMG_7794.jpeg), work-14.jpg (IMG_2641.jpeg).

quotes: the photos that I just added, put those photos to the our work
The photos that you have recorded, I need those to the our work section

acceptanceCriteria: All 14 uploaded images are saved as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with the filenames work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg.
Each file is accessible via the /assets/generated/ static path in the browser.

requirements.text: Update the Gallery (Our Work) component to remove all previously used project photos and replace them exclusively with the 14 new static assets (work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg) loaded from /assets/generated/. The gallery layout, lightbox functionality, navigation, and all other UI elements must remain unchanged.

quotes: Take off all the photos to the our Work section
put those photos to the our work

acceptanceCriteria: The Our Work / Gallery section displays exactly the 14 new project photos and no previously existing photos.
All images are loaded from /assets/generated/work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg as static paths (not fetched from the backend).
The responsive grid layout, lightbox modal, previous/next navigation, and category badges remain intact and functional.
No placeholder images, broken images, or old photos appear in the gallery.

constraints: Do not modify backend image storage or retrieval logic.
Do not alter the gallery layout, lightbox behavior, or any other UI outside of the photo source list.
Images must be loaded as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated/, not fetched from the backend.
nonGoals: Adding new gallery features such as filtering, categories, or pagination.
Changing the visual design or layout of the Our Work section.
Modifying any other section of the website.
